Text.Name: BottleNeck1
Text.Desc: I have finally managed to breakthrough.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Breakthrough leaves one rhapsodic

Text.Name: BottleNeck2
Text.Desc: Practice is harder than I thought...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Failing to perform a Breakthrough really leaves one dispirited

Text.Name: BottleNeck3
Text.Desc: This state has lasted too long without a Breakthrough...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Being stuck in one's training really leaves one restless and testy

Text.Name: BottleNeck4
Text.Desc: My hard work is finally paying off!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A long-awaited Breakthrough really fills one with joy

Text.Name: BottleNeck5
Text.DisplayName: Wavering Along the Road to Immortality
Text.Desc: This state has lasted too long without a Breakthrough...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Being stuck in one's training really leaves one restless and testy

Text.Name: ThunderDisaster1
Text.Desc: I can sense the upcoming tribulation.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult to put one's mind at ease in this type of situation

Text.Name: ThunderDisaster2
Text.Desc: It was close, but it's over.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Surviving a tribulation really puts a smile on one's face!

Text.Name: ThunderDisaster3
Text.Desc: Heavenly Tribulation are vicious...it looks like there is no hope of ascension now.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The tribulation was a failure, and that it looks like the Law has come to an end for this one is crippling

Text.Name: Dan1
Text.Desc: Immortality is within sight!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that One is invigorated by their approaching immortality

Text.Name: Dan2
Text.Desc: Forming the Golden Core, becoming an earthly Immortal, this is the first step to true immortality.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that the Golden Core has been formed helps one to breathe a sigh of relief

Text.Name: Dan3
Text.Desc: I formed a high-grade Golden Core, this is fantastic news!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A sense of pride wells up at such a great accomplishment

Text.Name: Dan4
Text.Desc: A mid-grade Golden Core is rare.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such an accomplishment really imbues one with a sense of accomplishment

Text.Name: StageUp
Text.Desc: Long periods of training eventually have their benefits.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such a Breakthrough leaves one quite pleased

Text.Name: FrameOfMind1
Text.Desc: There's too much to do, I can't do it all!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A scattered mental state led to a breakdown

Text.Name: FrameOfMind2
Text.Desc: I'm distracted and can't settle down...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that An unstable mental state can really get on one's nerves

Text.Name: FrameOfMind3
Text.Desc: Things are normal, not bad or good.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling not bad when things are so normal

Text.Name: FrameOfMind4
Text.Desc: I feel as full as the moon and vigorous like the sea.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A sense of fulfillment like this is gratifying

Text.Name: FrameOfMind5
Text.Desc: Your mind is like glass.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A sense of clarity like this is gratifying

Text.Name: FrameOfMind6
Text.Desc: My mind feels flawless like nothing is corrupting it.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such a sense of flawlessness is highly unusual to say the least

Text.Name: TravelExperience
Text.Desc: I haven't been on an adventure in so long, I'm quite antsy.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Being stuck in one place for too long can cause one to yearn for adventure

Text.Name: SitCrosslegged1
Text.Desc: If only there were a more comfortable place to train...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Meditating on the ground causes distraction

Text.Name: SitCrosslegged2
Text.Desc: I feel like I'm getting twice as much work done with half the effort!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Pleasant practice feels truly rewarding

Text.Name: PracticeLing1
Text.Desc: This place possesses such intense Qi, this place is truly great for one's Practice.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Practice goes smoothly in such a place of intense Qi

Text.Name: PracticeLing2
Text.Desc: This place has enough Qi to make it a pretty good place for Practice.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Practice goes well in a place like this

Text.Name: PracticeLing3
Text.Desc: There's not enough Qi here, but sometimes you just have to make do.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Places with such insufficient amounts of Qi are not ideal

Text.Name: PracticeLing4
Text.Desc: This place is not good for Practice, there's no where near enough Qi.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Trying to practice in a place with poor Qi leaves one discontent

Text.Name: PracticeElement1
Text.DisplayName: Perfect Alignment of the Five Elements
Text.Desc: The Five Elements here are perfectly attuned to my own, this is excellent for Practice.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The Five Elements being in perfect alignment really makes one feel like a fish in water

Text.Name: PracticeElement2
Text.DisplayName: The Five Elements are in Harmony
Text.Desc: This place is not bad for my Practice.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Things go smoothly when the Five Elements are in harmony with one's own

Text.Name: PracticeElement3
Text.DisplayName: The Five Elements are in Disarray
Text.Desc: This is not a good place for my Practice.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Trying to practice in place where the Five Elements are in disarray gets on one's nerves

Text.Name: PracticeElement4
Text.DisplayName: The Five Elements are Restraining Each Other
Text.Desc: I can't stay here for long, the Five Elements are in opposite alignment from mine own.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The Five Elements being so out of alignment bears down on one's spirit
